title: I\'m planning to move to the Wilmington area in the near future from Massachusetts.  What kinds of critters and snakes are most common that I can expect to see in my backyard and what kinds of \'man eating\' insects can I expect to encounter regularly?  Who can tell me how to deal with the very pesky critters and insects?
text:
Welcome to Wilmington.

Probably one of the peskiest insects you're likely to encounter in a
lawn are fire ants, which build distinctive mounds, but they are
controllable with treatments available at lawn and garden stores.
Mosquitoes are another favorite bug to complain about. As for snakes,
the ones that are poisonous are generally afraid of people and aren't
common in developed neighborhoods. If you want detailed information on
handling garden pests, the Coopertative Extension Service is a good
source of information. The link to the website is included in one of
these entries.

Here are some MyReporter links that might help:
